instruction.german: You joined a new music club at your school and you are very excited about it. Write to your friend to tell them all about it. Write 80–100 words.

parts:
In your email:

  • tell them what the music club does (e.g. activities, events, or projects)
  • say how you found out about the club
  • explain why you joined the club
  • invite your friend to join and explain why they would enjoy it
